plays.text: Penalty to Mariusz Czerkawski 2 minutes for Kneeing Richard Matvichuk
Goal scored by Sergei Zubov unassisted
Goal scored by Manny Malhotra assisted by Rob DiMaio and Kirk Muller
Penalty to Jose Theodore 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified) served by Oleg Petrov
Goal scored by Jason Arnott assisted by Pierre Turgeon and Philippe Boucher
Goal scored by Oleg Petrov assisted by Yanic Perreault
Penalty to Andrei Markov 2 minutes for Tripping Mike Modano
Penalty to Philippe Boucher 2 minutes for Tripping Saku Koivu
Penalty to Patrick Traverse 2 minutes for High Sticking Scott Young
Penalty to Philippe Boucher 2 minutes for Crosschecking Oleg Petrov
Penalty to Donald Audette 2 minutes for Obstruction - Tripping Derian Hatcher
Goal scored by Richard Zednik assisted by Saku Koivu
Penalty to Darryl Sydor 2 minutes for Holding Richard Zednik
Goal scored by Jere Lehtinen assisted by Ulf Dahlen
